definition.name: Bicep Deploy
definition.description: GitHub Action for deploying to Azure
definition.author: Microsoft

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Specifies the execution type, which can be either 'deployment' or 'deploymentStack'.

inputs.name: operation
inputs.description: Specifies the operation to perform. For deployment, choose from 'create', 'validate', 'whatIf'. For deploymentStack, choose from 'create', 'delete', 'validate'.

inputs.name: scope
inputs.description: Specifies the scope of the deployment or deploymentStack. For deployment, choose from 'resourceGroup', 'subscription', 'managementGroup', 'tenant'. For deploymentStack, choose from 'resourceGroup', 'subscription', 'managementGroup'.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Specifies the name of the deployment or deploymentStack.

inputs.name: location
inputs.description: Specifies the location of the deployment or deploymentStack. Must be provided if the 'scope' parameter is 'subscription', 'managementGroup' or 'tenant'.

inputs.name: tenant-id
inputs.description: Specifies the tenant ID. Required if the 'scope' parameter is 'tenant'.

inputs.name: management-group-id
inputs.description: Specifies the management group ID. Required if the 'scope' parameter is 'managementGroup'.

inputs.name: subscription-id
inputs.description: Specifies the subscription ID. Required if the 'scope' parameter is 'subscription' or 'resourceGroup'.

inputs.name: resource-group-name
inputs.description: Specifies the resource group name. Required if the 'scope' parameter is 'resourceGroup'.

inputs.name: template-file
inputs.description: Specifies the path to the template file.

inputs.name: parameters-file
inputs.description: Specifies the path to the parameters file (.json or .bicepparam).

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.description: Specifies the inline parameters to use (as json object).

inputs.name: masked-outputs
inputs.description: Specifies output names to mask values for.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.description: Specifies the Azure environment to use. Choose from 'azureCloud', 'azureChinaCloud', 'azureGermanCloud', 'azureUSGovernment'.

inputs.name: what-if-exclude-change-types
inputs.description: Specifies the change types to exclude from the 'What If' operation.

inputs.name: validation-level
inputs.description: Specifies the validation level. Only supported for deployment what-if and validate operations. Choose from 'provider', 'template', or 'providerNoRbac'.

inputs.name: action-on-unmanage-resources
inputs.description: Specifies the action to take on unmanaged resources. Choose from 'delete' or 'detach'.

inputs.name: action-on-unmanage-resourcegroups
inputs.description: Specifies the action to take on unmanaged resource groups. Choose from 'delete' or 'detach'.

inputs.name: action-on-unmanage-managementgroup
inputs.description: Specifies the action to take on unmanaged management groups. Choose from 'delete' or 'detach'.

inputs.name: deny-settings-mode
inputs.description: Specifies the mode of the deny settings. Choose from 'denyDelete', 'denyWriteAndDelete', 'none'.

inputs.name: deny-settings-excluded-actions
inputs.description: Specifies the excluded actions for the deny settings.

inputs.name: deny-settings-excluded-principals
inputs.description: Specifies the excluded principals for the deny settings.

inputs.name: deny-settings-apply-to-child-scopes
inputs.description: When specified, the deny setting mode configuration also applies to the child scope of the managed resources.

inputs.name: bypass-stack-out-of-sync-error
inputs.description: Specifies whether to bypass the stack out of sync error. Choose from 'true' or 'false'.

inputs.name: description
inputs.description: Specifies the description of the deploymentStack.

inputs.name: tags
inputs.description: Specifies the tags for the deploymentStack.

inputs.name: bicep-version
inputs.description: Specifies the version of Bicep to use for compilation. If not provided, the latest version will be used. Example string: '0.38.5'
